main.name: Bhuvanesh Rajakarthikeyan
main.description: Currently involved in developing apps that caters to clinicians in hospitals in viewing patient data.
main.bio: I enjoy being challenged and working on projects that require me to work outside my comfort and knowledge set, as continuing to learn new languages and development techniques are important to me and to the success of any organization.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Few Highlights. Always eager to learn new ones...

education.description: Masters allowed me to learn new technologies and languages and enhance my problem-solving skills by working on various challenging projects.
Bachelors is where my interest in coding turned into a passion as the algorithmic way of finding a solution to a problem always intrigued me a lot.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Worked on migration of Rails View models to React JS components for a web chart of clinical data for physicians and nurses. Integrating iOS web app with Voice and Messenger feature for better accessibility. Assisted in development of disconnected mobile app that supports offline mode for home care nurses. Implemented knowledge base portal where the clients or sales executives can find answers about a solution. Assisted in adding OAuth 2 support for REST APIs.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Developed a portal for peer to peer evaluation of assessments based on the Factory Design Pattern. Worked on UI and backend business logic of the Fred Meyer Jewelers portal for the client Kroger Company using the Agile methodology, Sitecore Commerce Server, Git, JIRA, Confluence and C#.
